effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect_entries.short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user shrouds itself in electricity
and smashes into its target.
It also damages the user a little.
